Description:
6% APPROX. RETURN ON INVESTMENT
An attractive investment opportunity with approx 6% return, this pair of modern two bedroom units on one title close to the Eaglehawk shopping district with great long term tenants is not one to pass!
Both units have two bedrooms, one with a WIR and include a hostess kitchen with gas hotplates and electric oven. A reverse cycle split system controls the climate of the units
The units are well insulated with hebel brick, a single carport per unit, rear alfresco and within walking distance to Eaglehawk shops, supermarket and schools
Currently returning $25480 per year (245 x 2) with great long term tenants
These units located in a quiet position in Eaglehawk will make a great addition to your investment portfolio with a great return.
Insights: 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Eaglehawk have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Friendly Home With Room To Entertain
When it comes to quality builds, you can look no further than a JG King built home.
6 Counsel Road is a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom and 2 living zones, family home. Boasting high spec features throughout.
Families will love the separation of 2 great sized living areas. The large kitchen overlooks the family living room and offers stone benchtops and 900mm wide appliances, stone splashback and sleek, quality cabinetry.
Year-round comfort is assured with ducted heating a cooling. While you will take advantage of the fantastic alfresco area. Which leads to the good-sized, low maintenance backyard and lock-up garden shed.
Master bedroom offers walk-in robe with ensuite, whilst all other bedrooms offer built-in robes and ceiling fans.
The main bathroom offers a large tub and a separate toilet.
The offer is completed with double lock up garage with internal and rear access.

Description:
Tranquility in Spades
Set on 2.5 acres of quiet bushland, sits 4 Kooroork Lane, Junortoun.
Sitting back from the road and peacefully surrounded by beautiful bushland, yet under 10 minutes to the Bendigo CBD, you really can have it all.
Boasting an entryway of grand proportions, the tone is set early. All elements of this property are generous, from the multiple living zones, the oversized master and huge swimming pool, entertainers kitchen with 900 wide ovens and cooktop. The home also has its own tiered home theatre.
You can rely on year-round comfort, with split system heating and cooling in the lounge and theatre, as well as the gas log fire in the main living zone.
Adding to the offer is the enclosed alfresco area down the northern aspect of the home and large alfresco area overlooking the pool and double lock-up garage with internal access.
Just a fantastic offering, sure to impress.

Description:
STUNNING RENOVATION IN GREAT CENTRAL LOCALE
Ideally located just minutes from the heart of the city and walking distance to train station, sporting reserve and bike track, is this immaculate and fully renovated character home. The high-end quality finish offers the very best of modern living, whilst retaining many original features that provide a charming feel to the space.
The neat façade offers both steps and a ramp up to the front porch. Set back from the road, the home features a sense of peace and quiet as soon as you step indoors. Beyond the front entry is a large open plan kitchen, living and dining room. A carpeted lounge area provides a cosy feel, and quality timber flooring through the rest of the living space perfectly suits the style of the home. To one side of the entry is a second, formal, living space that is light and bright thanks to dual aspect windows and would also serve as a fantastic home office. The brand-new kitchen makes use of the original floorplan, including the stove space, and features ample storage.
A hallway leads down towards the rear of the home and opens into all three bedrooms, each of which is generously proportioned and offers ceiling fans and built-in robes. The master bedroom enjoys extra storage, along with a modern ensuite with double vanity, and a gas log fireplace surrounded by a timber mantle. The remaining two bedrooms are serviced by a large and light family bathroom with stone benchtop, double vanity and luxurious stone freestanding bathtub. A separate toilet, and a modern and bright laundry at the rear of the home complete the floorplan.
Outdoors, a sunny deck is perfect for outdoor living, and this overlooks a low-maintenance lawn area. Garden beds run along the fence line of all four sides of the property and, at the rear, the high fence offers security and privacy. A large garden shed is the perfect space for storage or a workshop, and there is easy vehicle access from both the side and rear streets to a large area allocated to off-street parking.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Ceiling fans throughout
Gas fireplace in master (within timber mantle surround)
Fully renovated including new roof, flooring, carpets, paint and heating/cooling
Original heritage features retained such as high timber-lined ceilings, stained glass windows and decorative architraves
High-end, modern kitchen appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dual-drawer dishwasher
Operational alarm system in the house
Garden is under automated irrigation system
Garden shed/workshop
Rear and side vehicle access to the property
Excellent off-street parking
Positioned in a highly-sought after area, this property is perfect for a professional, young family or retiree seeking quality and easy-care city living. Alternatively, the proximity to all amenities also makes this home an appealing option for an investor seeking a high-end short-term rental or Airbnb. With absolutely nothing to do, this immaculate property is move-in ready and also allows a flexible space with scope for a buyer to really make it their own.
Insights: 146 Williamson Street, Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 81 other 3 bedroom house in Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
ACCLAIMED CITY LANDMARK Circa 1930
Ninety years of family ownershipCraftsman built by Robert Poulston a renowned builder of the era, set on 3 titles comprising 6 crown allotments with rear access off Joseph Street, total land holding 2225m (approx.)
Original solid brick residence in exceptional condition comprising 4 bedrooms, home office/library with original built in cabinetry, lounge with bay window, servery and stunning feature timber ceiling, original leadlight windows and decorative ceilings and fretwork, expansive upstairs living/bedroom
Zoned General residential. Frontage to Bridge Street 32m (approx.) Average depth 66m (approx.)
Diverse scope and potential to renovate and extend onto the existing dwelling and or further develop/subdivide utilising both street frontages, suitable for both residential or medical/allied health (s.t.c.a.)
Remarks: So much potential in one of Bendigos premier tree lined streets. Located within close proximity and walking distance to Bendigo Hospital, Lake Weeroona and the C.B.D.
Email matt@tsfn.com.au to receive an information memorandum e book with E.O.I particulars.

Description:
FAMILY ENTERTAINER!
Since this property was placed on the market the vendors have replaced the carpet throughout and painted the entire home throughout in a neutral white. It now feels like a new home!
If you're seeking a large family home designed for those that love to entertain then look no further. Positioned in a well-regarded location nearby to Epsom Village Shopping Precinct is this well proportioned family residence complete with large outdoor entertaining zone, 9m x 6m workman's shed and an in-ground heated pool.
With upgrades aplenty including high ceilings, stone benchtops, spacious bedrooms and crimsafe window fittings the home itself offers 4 generous bedrooms with WIR and en-suite in master and BIR in the remaining 3. The generous home office sits opposite the master suite and could easily be used as a 5th bedroom for those that need. There are 3 separate living zones including carpeted lounge, oversized family/dining plus a separate rumpus or cinema room which can be closed to the rest of the home. The fully-appointed central kitchen features stone island, 900ml gas cooktop, electric oven plus a large walk-in pantry.
A sliding glass door connects the family room to the north facing outdoor entertaining zone which then leads to the rear yard where you will find the large shed with ample steel rack storage and a recently installed self-cleaning compass pool complete with heat pump to extend your swimming season into the cooler months.
Move in and simply enjoy - the hard work is done!!
Insights: 47 Garden Drive, Epsom VIC 3551 was last sold in 2020 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Epsom have recently been sold.

Description:
Move Straight into blue chip location
This attractive property should be at the top of your list if you're looking for style, affordability and space in a location that is highly regarded and renowned for excellent growth and convenient living.
- Impressive design with floorplan comprising 3 large bedrooms 2 with BIR's. A fully renovated kitchen with all modern appliances and ample bench space. The meals and lounge area with open fireplace comes with a beautiful outllook.
There is an updated bathroom and a spacious fully renovated laundry which leads out to a private courtyard. Ducted gas heating throughout offers comfort for these cold days.
- Tastefully selected inclusions and colour schemes, solid brick walls throughout.
- Low maintainence allotment with a multitude of established trees, and a private lawn area that is perfect for young children and pets to enjoy. Additionally, there is a carport with an electric roller door providing plenty of secure off street parking.
- Close proximity to local secondary school, childcare facilities, La Trobe University, and both the Kennington and Strath Village shopping complexes which include dining options and speciality shops.
- Within two blocks of a Doctors surgery, pharmacy, corner store and post office. Close to bus stop and bicycle lanes.
Situated only 2km from Bendigo's CBD, this property would make an exceptional home for owner occupiers, and also a great property to commence, or expand on your investment portfolio.

Description:
Space, Serenity and Family Comforts
A quality family home boasting space, serenity and practicality.
Set on just under an acre and just off the Midland Highway, this property is in a quiet court and close to Huntly's shopping strip and a short drive to Epsom Village. The four-bedroom plus study, two-living, two-bathroom home is nestled back off the road and boasts a large immaculate front yard.
Many highlights throughout include a large front veranda, spacious 5.9m x 5.6m master bedroom with built-in robes, open plan living and kitchen, a separate family and dining as well as a study, and outside has the added bonus of two sheds with concrete and power.
The master, one bathroom and laundry to the left, all the living space set in the middle and the remaining living quarters to the right, enables plenty of privacy and space for the whole family. The kitchen features ample bench space, storage throughout, timber flooring and a unique servery into the dining area.
A quality wood burning fireplace in the family room and ceiling fans throughout enables year-round comfort.
Each bedroom is unique in design and offers convenient storage options; one with a walk-in robe and direct access to the main bathroom, one has wall-to-wall unique shelving and drawers while the other offers a built-in.
The highlight of the property is the outdoors; neat landscaped gardens and lawn, undercover and bricked barbecue area for easy entertaining, a 7.5m x 5m shed, 9m x 6m shed, fernery and handy rear access.
Set on its large block size and close to Huntly shops and surrounds, this property package won't last long.

Description:
Family Haven in Peaceful Surrounds
Set in popular Maiden Gully and situated opposite a peaceful bushland reserve, this fabulous 4-bedroom home will appeal to young families, retirees and investors alike.
Comprising 4 bedrooms, the main has a spacious ensuite with a large shower, while the other 3 bedrooms all have built-in robes.
Centrally located is the well-appointed kitchen with gas hot plates and electric oven, dishwasher and ample storage cupboards. Accessed directly off the family/dining area is an under-roof line pergola making it ideal for family entertaining and outdoor alfresco living.
There are two good sized separate living areas, and the ducted gas heating and evap cooling ensure year round comfort.
Outside is a low maintenance 625m2 block, a double garage with remote door and access roller door to the back yard, along with ample side access for a caravan, boat or trailer.
Ten minutes to Bendigo CBD, and only a very short drive to Maiden Gully shops and primary school.
With walking/bike track adjacent to the home, this is the perfect place for a family to thrive.
Currently tenanted on a month to month basis.
Phone to arrange an inspection today.

Description:
SPACIOUS HOME IN FAMILY-FRIENDLY COURT
Beautifully presented, this contemporary home sits at the end of a small, quiet, family-friendly court. With a walking track at the end of the street leading to reserve, playground and bushland tracks and trails, the home is just minutes from the many amenities on offer in both Epsom and Huntly including supermarkets, schools, shops, train station and golf course.
The house is positioned on a wide allotment with a neat, spacious lawn area to one side of the entry. The driveway leads to the double garage and is extended to offer vehicle access to the rear yard via gates at one side, ensuring there is ample off-street parking. The front door opens into a spacious and light-filled hallway that leads on one side to a large master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. Next door is a second bedroom, with built-in robe, that could serve as a nursery, guest room or home office. The remaining two bedrooms can be found in a separate wing off the central living area and both include built-in robes. This area of the home includes a family bathroom, separate toilet, linen closet and a large, light laundry with sliding door access to the side yard.
At the front of the home is a formal living room, and this leads through into a sizable open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The galley kitchen offers quality appliances and ample storage, and large windows and glass sliding doors provide an abundance of natural light. Beyond this central living space is a third lounge, at the rear of the home. This generously-proportioned room would make a perfect rumpus room or kids retreat.
Both the end lounge and the central living space offer doors leading out to a good-sized alfresco area. The rear yard enjoys a neat lawn and built-in garden beds. The driveway runs down the side of the house to the shed at the back of the block, and an additional garden shed provides extra storage or work space.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating
Modern kitchen appliances including built-in microwave, dishwasher and 900mm stove with five-burner gas cooktop
Secure access to the double garage from inside the home and from the rear yard
Double gates providing secure vehicle access to rear yard
Large shed with roller door (6m x 6m with concrete flooring, power and lights)
Garden shed (2.5m x 3m with concrete flooring)
Move-in ready and offering an immaculate presentation both inside and out, this property is absolutely ideal for a family seeking an easy-care home that provides space for everyone. With large rooms, a fantastic floorplan, close to amenities and not a thing to do, this home is an exceptional offering at this price.

Description:
Quality From Start To Finish
Even before stepping inside 165 Job Gully Road, it quality of choices in the build are apparent. From the cleverly landscaped front yard, to the exposed aggregate drive way. Step inside and the quality continues.
This 3 bedroom family home offers all you could want in spades, as great size living, dining and kitchen space featuring gas cooktop and walk in pantry, kitchen island bench with breakfast bar and ample storage.
The second and third bedrooms have build in robes and a lovely aspect across toward Neangar Park Golf Course, whilst the master is of generous proportions, with walk robe and ensuite .
Families will appreciate the neat and tidy laundry with good sized linen press. Main bathroom with tub & separate toilet, and double lock up garage with direct access into the house and also into the back yard. Completing the offer inside, is ducted heating throughout and split system cooling the living and master.
Once back outside, many summer evenings will be spent out the back with the sheltered alfresco entertainers area. Complete with ceiling fan, tv point and mounts, and plenty of room for the barbecue and outdoor setting!
Selling with a secure lease in place, a fantastic investment opportunity that is sure to impress. Contact Sacha today, because these ones never last long!

Description:
SUPERBLY RENOVATED & CENTRAL TO EVERYTHING!
Experience city fringe living at its absolute finest in the form of this beautifully renovated period home situated on the doorstep of all that Bendigo has to offer! Set on an established and manageable town allotment, the premium location is a sought after luxury. Offering a short walk to and from the city centre for work, or a leisurely stroll to enjoy the city's renowned galleries, cafés, restaurants and shopping, you can simplify your lifestyle (and your carbon footprint) by enjoying the convenience of being central to everything!
The totally renovated home is a credit to the current owners, and has left nothing for the new owner to do. The renovations have been sympathetic to the era of the original home, meaning its's character and charm remain in tact. Perfect for singles, couples and young families alike, this sort of hassle-free city lifestyle is highly sought after in today's market. In very solid order, features include beautiful polished hardwood floors, high ceilings, timber windows, plenty of natural light, updated kitchen and bathrooms, new roofing, fresh painting, and split system heating and cooling to name a few.
Internally, the deceptively large floor plan boasts four carpeted bedrooms, or three plus a generous study (it's up to you?). The spacious master suite is complete with walk in robe and its own modern three piece ensuite! The main bathroom has also been fully modernised and includes shower, bath and separate toilet. The central hallway lined with gorgeous timber floors leads to the rear, and opens to the huge open plan kitchen meals and spacious living area. Lovely big windows and glass doors allow plenty of natural light. The spacious kitchen has been wonderfully renovated with all the mod cons included. Boasting expansive bench tops, up to date cooking appliances, dishwasher, and loads of cupboard space, you cant help but be impressed. The living space is light bright and airy, roomy enough for a gathering of lots of friends or family (or intimate enough for two) with fabulous sunny views to the deck area.
Outside is a good sized allotment; its size (approx 733m2) is more than generous for inner city living. With a lovely established garden and landscaped yard already in place, you won't become a slave here! The sun deck at the back door provides a great space to entertain guests and have breakfast, and it flows further into a covered and enclosed space that is perfect for the cooler months. At the rear of the covered space is a laundry, separate toilet, and a handy bike/storage room. A large garden shed is existing, with plenty of space to construct a larger shed if needed. There is a nice yard at the side, with the lawn area an ideal spot for a pool if desired. Off street parking is provided for multiple cars, including a double carport. All this behind the attractive white picket fence that everyone craves so much!
Ideally suited to those looking to experience the convenience of inner city living, you must visit this property to truly appreciate what it could offer you. It will honestly be love at first sight! Given its location and broad appeal, you had better act quick as it surely will not last long!
** IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS DURING COVID-19 EPIDEMIC **
Open for inspection attendees must comply to the following to be permitted entry to a property
- Names and full details will be recorded
- Observe social distancing
- Obey instructions from the estate agent
- Leave the property if requested by the estate agent
- Do not touch any surfaces or door handles unless the estate agent allows it
Please do not attend the inspection if you are unwell or exhibiting symptoms of Covid-19
If there is no more space or the property is at capacity, we will ask you to return to your vehicle and we will flag you when we have more space.

Description:
Pioneer Rise Estate - Strathfieldsaye's newly released sub-division- Lucky last block!
- Outstanding building block of 760m2 with rural outlook
- Strathfieldsaye's newly released sub-division offers all services and has a lovely rural outlook
- Level 1 filled areas - filling if any is compacted to achieve a similar or better density than natural ground, so no significant cost to build on the level 1 filled areas
- Pioneer Rise Estate is serviced by underground electricity, natural gas, town water, NBN ready, planning permits to build are also in place for each dwelling. All you require is your building permit
- Bushfire Attack Levels (BAL ratings) Lots 8-13, 20-32, 35-41- BAL 12.5. Lots 33 & 34 - BAL 29. All other lots are not in a BMO so Bal ratings are likely to be minima
- Growing suburb of Strathfieldsaye, fabulous community with all amenities
- Location is on the corner of Ryalls Lane and Guys Hill Road, Strathfieldsaye
- Demand will be significant so call Gavin to secure a block of choice.
- Lot 26 is a 760m2 available at $205,000 and the last block available in Stage 1
This fabulous new sub-division only just now released offers families an opportunity to buy a lovely block in the fast growing suburb of Strathfieldsaye. A great family community where people enjoy living and take advantage all that Strathfieldsaye has to offer as well as being only minutes to the Bendigo CBD.

Description:
Prime Development Potential (STCA) - Land Bank or Make it Your Own
It gets said a lot, but this opportunity is definitely one not to miss!
Imagine owning just over 1600m2 of land near Lake Weeroona, Bendigo CBD and minutes to Bendigo's new hospital and medical hub, adding to the investment portfolio and setting up your financial future.
While there is a small two-bedroom cottage currently on the block, the drawcard is the massive opportunity (STCA) for future development behind it. It's a promising investment with townhouse developments already occupying the surrounding area.
This property will cater for those looking to land bank and plan the next phase or development straight away.
A highlight of the property is the generous 6m x 12m three-phase powered and concreted shed with cool room inside, and is surrounded by secure colorbond fencing.
Another added bonus is the two access points, either enter via Strickland Road or around the back off the unsealed road into Riley Street through double gates, where the shed sits.
The location is idyllic; just 1.3km to Lake Weeroona, 2.2km to Bendigo Health and only 2.5km to the CBD.
You have to be quick, this investment potential won't last long. Currently leased with the tenant occupying the home for the last 10 years.

Description:
Ideally located, move straight in
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 24595
Looking for a low maintenance home that is truly neat as a pin? A visit to this property will not disappoint.
This immaculate property has 3 large bedrooms all with BIRs. Newly polished floorboards in living and dining create an inviting and functional space for spending time with family and friends. Cooking up a storm will be a breeze in the large kitchen, boasting plenty of bench space and ample cabinetry. You will be surprised by the available storage with a large linen cupboard and additional utility closet.
THE HOUSE FEATURES:-
Good sized bedrooms all with BIRs and ceiling fans
New carpet to main bedroom
Newly polished floorboards in entry/living/dining
Large galley style kitchen with electric appliances
Family bathroom with heat lamps
Separate toilet and additional shower room
Evaporative cooling throughout with gas heating
Outdoor covered deck area
Single carport and additional off street parking
This tidy home, situated on a compact block is a clean slate; leave as is for a no maintenance yard, or create a garden just how you like it. Only a 15 minute walk to Bendigo CBD or metres from a local bus stop, conveniently located for childcare or local schools, university and shopping centres alike. Exercise outdoors at the nearby park, walking/bike tracks and activity spaces only minutes away or take a stroll to your local café and coffee shop or post office and general store.
Ideal for retirees, first home buyers or ready to rent for the astute investor, this property will appeal to many.
ABOUT BENDIGO:-
Flora Hill is an inner suburb of one of the most livable cities in Victoria.
Major state of the art public & private hospitals.
Catchment area for excellent primary and secondary schools
In close proximity to LaTrobe University and Bendigo TAFE college.
Multiple art galleries and theatres for performance art.
7 cinema complex with Goldclass and boutique cinemas close by.
Commutable by train to Melbourne.
Good local transport and various walking/bike tracks around the city and surrounding areas.
Tourism centre with active goldmine and culturally significant history.

Description:
BOUTIQUE BUILDING ALLOTMENT
$25,000 HOMEBUILDER GRANT may be available for eligible buyers.
After a quick selling stage 1 the highly anticipated stage 2 release is here! Harveys Lane is located only 4kms to the Bendigo CBD and 3kms to Lake Weeroona this community offers a mix of easy care lifestyle blocks and larger family allotments with generous frontages.
Boasting 0.8 hectares of open space and a total of 72 lots this development offers something for everyone. Stage 2 consists of 27 lots ranging in size from 419m2 to 882m2.

Description:
VACANT BLOCK WITH STUNNING CITY VIEWS IN PRIME LOCALE
This is an incredible opportunity to secure a quality piece of land on one of Bendigos most prestigious streets. The sizeable block offers stunning views across the city and all services ensure all that is required is the addition of a beautiful, brand new home.
Walking distance to bus stops, schools, Strath Village and Kennington Reservoir, and just five minutes drive to the CBD, this in an established area surrounded by quality properties and close to it all. To find an allotment of this size, in this area, is truly a unique chance to create something incredible.
Additional features include:
Zoned General Residential
All services including gas, electricity, phone and NBN
Street frontage facing Mill Street
Ready to build on (pending title)
For the buyer looking for a rare chance to build their dream home in a dream location, this is the ultimate pocket of land in a simply sensational position.

Description:
Beautiful Landscape
Within easy walking distance of the town centre and the mighty Loddon River, this bushy block consists of 6 allotments in 5 titles. The property is part Township Zone and part Farming Zone and fronts 2 roads. An old V-Line carriage will be included in the sale.
